metadata.title: [Circular letters, 23 December 1790 to 15 March 1791, on local matters]
metadata.creator: Basses-Alpes (France)
Basses-Alpes (France)
metadata.description: Without titles; some are without imprint (as indicated below) Dates are mostly at head of text on p.[1]
Most items are signed: Les administrateurs composant le directoire du département des Basses Alpes

Digne le 23 décembre 1790 [with imprint; [2] p.] -- Digne, le 6 janvier 1791 [without imprint; [2] p.] -- Digne le 12 janvier 1792 [with imprint; [2] p.] -- Digne, le 3 février 1791 [without imprint; [3] p.] -- Dated at end: Digne, le 10 mars 1791 [without imprint; [2] p.] -- Digne, le 15 mars 1791 [with imprint; 6 p.]
metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Page number 5 of volume 6 is numbered incorrectly. Title is on the cover page. Uneven binding. Skewed text. Damaged, stained and/or loose pages.
